LanguageData.SawNecrophilia_Abhorrent.stages.0.label: 被姦屍嚇壞了
LanguageData.SawNecrophilia_Horrible.stages.0.label: 受到姦屍的困擾
LanguageData.SawNecrophilia_Horrible.stages.0.descrip: 呃，太噁心了！他們到底在想什麼？
LanguageData.SawNecrophilia_Disapproved.stages.0.desc: 連死人也不能在這裡安息…
LanguageData.SawNecrophilia_Acceptable.stages.0.label: 目擊姦屍
LanguageData.SawNecrophilia_Acceptable.stages.0.descr: 他們最好在結束後埋好剩下的東西…
LanguageData.SawNecrophilia_Approved.stages.0.label: 核准姦屍
